name: Indiana Jones - Raiders of the Lost Ark
reflection: First movie that we watched together! Curled up in my EVGR bed - super cute. I barely remember the movie; I was too excited and happy being with you.

name: Get Hard
reflection: We watched this after my first bike race on your couch. Fantastic choice on your side!

name: Crazy, Stupid, Love
reflection: We turned your living room into a movie theater to watch this. Great movie and great vibes.

name: The Long Game
reflection: After watching 10 min of this movie over someone's shoulder on a plane, I knew I had to watch it with you. And despite some pushback, you liked it ;)

name: Die Hard
reflection: It only took me 3 days and a lot of deep breaths to get through this movie, but the popcorn and cuddles got me through it.
